title: shrIpati mukha viracita
sahitya:
shrIpati mukha viracita pUjyE shrI pArvati mAm pAhi dEvI


anupallavi

  nIpa vana nilayE nirAmayE jAyE mama hrdaya tApahAriNi navaratnAlayE tApa svara nAradamuditE dEvI


caraNam 1    taruNi latA pallava mrdu caraNE tapana vidhu vilOcanE aruNa kOTi sama kAntiyuta 
sharIrE kaladhrta kalApE surucira maNi ghaNtala sanmaNi hArE suguNa shIlE satatam 
samudam karuNayA avadInam paradEvatE kAmakOTi pIThagatE lalitE
    caraNam 2    karimukha kArtikEya janani svarapAlini pAvani hari sahOdari vidaLita 
daityArigaNE sadA pUrNE paramEsha vinutE shrtajana pAlitE prItiha vasatu 
vimalE purahara priyE shashibhAnanE pUrNakAmE sAmagAna lOlE 
    caraNam 3    shyAmaLAngi manjuLavANi sakala bhaya nivAraNi hE mahEshvari madhupa 
sadrsha vENi kAmEshvari gauri shyAmakrSNa sOdari bhuvanEshvari shAmbhavi 
mahA tripurasundari himagiri kumAri kavikula kAmadE kAnkSita phaladEyikE
